title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing green beans in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing green beans in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says: Seeing green beans in a dream may indicate the death of fears and problems that appear in the dreamer’s life. Likewise, seeing green beans in a dream can indicate fatigue at work for the fortuneteller, earning money and also a lot of money. Of halal food, and God knows best. Also, seeing green beans in a dream can indicate the achievement of all the goals that the dreamer seeks to achieve in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing green beans in a dream for a single woman: For an unmarried girl to see green beans in her dream, this indicates The end of her worries, her excellence, and her brilliant success, and God knows best. Also, seeing green beans in a dream can indicate a good marriage for an unmarried girl and also that she will earn a lot of money, livelihood, and a lot of money. Also, seeing green beans in a dream may indicate that the girl is going through a major financial crisis and is trying Earning money at her job to earn a lot of money. Seeing green beans in a dream can indicate her victory over her friends, and it also shows that she has not been deceived by the people around her. Interpretation of seeing green beans in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman dreams of seeing green beans, this indicates The end of her worries and the differences that occur between her and her husband. Also, seeing green beans in a dream can indicate the woman’s imminent pregnancy and the realization of her fears and the goals she seeks to achieve. Also, seeing green beans in a dream for a married woman indicates that God will provide her husband with abundant and abundant wealth. It is not counted among them. Interpretation of seeing green beans in a dream for a pregnant woman: For a pregnant woman to dream of seeing green beans, this indicates the end of her worries and the ease of her next passage, God willing. Also, seeing beans in a dream indicates the approaching date of her birth, as well as many means of livelihood and easy and easy childbirth. Interpretation of seeing green beans in a dream for a man: If a sweet person dreams of seeing green beans, this indicates the disappearance of his worries and the abundance of livelihood that he earns, and God knows best. Also, seeing green beans in a dream may indicate that he joins a new job, as well as a good job and a prestigious position in which he lives. In it. This vision can also indicate the collapse of disputes and also the marriage of a nice man to a good girl who fears God and is very afraid of her family. Seeing green beans in a dream may indicate the arrival of good news to the pioneer and the good health that he will enjoy soon, and God knows best. Seeing bean fields Green in a dream: The interpretation of seeing walking in green bean fields in a dream is good news about the arrival of joys and pleasures to the dreamer’s home, God willing. Also, dreaming of picking beans from the field is evidence that the dreamer will move to a new life that is better than he had before. Seeing beans being planted In a dream, it indicates good conditions and the end of...

title: What are the meanings of good news in a dream for senior interpreters?

preview.html: Preaching in a dream is good news that some people exchange and try to convey positive things to each other. God Almighty said in the Book of the Mighty (For them is good news in this world and the hereafter). In this article, we look together at the most important things that have been said about the interpretation of this vision. Preaching in a dreamIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she hears good news, this means that she will receive a lot of good and joyful news in the coming period. In the event that the fortuneteller sees that someone promised him With something good, it symbolizes the arrival of goodness and happiness to him in the coming days. And for a married woman, if she sees in a dream that there is good news for her, this will lead to the positive changes that will happen to her during that period. Likewise, if one sees in a dream that it tells something about Something, this is a sign for him of a wide range of livelihood that will bring him abundant money that he will receive. And if a poor person sees in a dream that he is broadcasting news, this will lead to a change in his circumstances, freeing him from poverty, and opening a new page full of kindness. The person in question, if He saw good news in a dream, symbolizing the coming of comfort to him and the opening of the doors of livelihood and happiness. Secrets of Dream InterpretationThe expert includes a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access, type an online pageSecrets of Dream Interpretation on Google. Annunciation in a dream by Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing a happy person in a dream means that the dreamer will soon have many good changes in his life. And in the event that the fortuneteller sees that he has met a happy person, this portends the end of sadness and problems that They multiply on him. And when the girl sees that someone is promising her something, and it is funny, she nods her head to reach goals and aspirations and achieve the desired goal. The dreamer also sees that a happy person in a dream indicates getting rid of many of the difficulties and worries that are multiplying on him. And if the dreamer hears news Happy in a dream, it means that he is healthy and active in his life. In the event that a married woman receives good news, this indicates that she is an honest, successful and distinguished person in all aspects of her life. Preaching in a single woman’s dream. Ibn Sirin says that when single people hear the news of engagement or marriage , it means that they will receive a lot of goodness and have good luck. If the girl hears good news about her in a dream, this symbolizes marriage to a good man soon. And if the girl sees the moon in a dream, this means that she will be blessed by visiting the Sacred House of God or the Prophet’s Mosque. Also, for a dreamer to hear something good and good in a dream means that you will receive happy news and happy events in the coming days. Preaching in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman hears something good that brings good news in her dream, it means the stable life that she will live with her husband. And in case the dreamer sees That someone promises her good news, this symbolizes that a pregnancy will be provided soon. And when the dreamer sees that her husband is giving her good news, this means

title: Interpretation of a dream about green eyes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about green eyes in a dream via the Moments website. Green eyes are considered a source of attraction for the face and are more abundant in the West than in the Arab world, where eyes are considered one of the secrets of beauty and poets have written about the beauty of eyes in many poems about them, and in our article we will learn about seeing green eyes In a dream. Interpretation of a dream about green eyes by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees that many eyes are spread over his body, this indicates his good intentions. As for seeing eyes appearing in his stomach, this indicates that the dreamer is hypocritical and malicious. Seeing the presence of an eye in the dreamer’s heart indicates the extent of the purity of his heart. And his righteousness. Seeing his eyes replaced with the eyes of another man indicates that he has lost his sight and the guidance of another person. But if he sees that his eyes have been replaced with the eyes of a man he knows, this indicates that this man will marry his daughter. Seeing the iron eye shows that he has many worries. Seeing the eye in his hand indicates On making money.Interpretation of seeing green eyes in a dream: Seeing the color green in general shows the green nature of the earth and in the eyes it shows nature and life. If a girl sees a person with green eyes, this person will get happiness from him. If a girl sees a man with green eyes and he closes his eyes, she will feel sorry Towards him. A woman who sees that she has green eyes indicates the arrival of happiness for her and her family. Seeing a pregnant woman with green eyes indicates that she will benefit from him if he is mahram. If he is a stranger, he will be close to the family and his friendship or marriage with a family member will deteriorate. Seeing a woman who is not A married woman with green eyes indicates how psychologically comfortable, nourished, and happy she is. Seeing her green eyes closed expresses her sadness for her and the harsh life she will live in reality. A man’s green eyes indicate good deeds. A man’s green eyes also indicate profit and livelihood. But seeing his green eyes closed It means that he will be sad and will not get money. Whoever sees that there is whiteness in his eyes will be sad and distressed. However, seeing whiteness indicates the end of worries and the coming of joy.

The wallpaper in a dream also indicates marriage or a new life that is better than before. The wallpaper in a dream can represent a new beginning in the dreamer’s life. title: Interpretation of a dream about murder according to Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about killing in a dream by Al-Asimi. Interpretation of dreams: Murder in a dream. It indicates ambition, if one sees himself killed in a dream. A dream about killing means good and abundant food. As for someone who dreams in a dream that he committed suicide, this indicates that he has committed many sins and will repent to God and will not return to God. Those sins again. If the dreamer sees a person killed in a dream, this indicates the psychological pressures that the dreamer is going through at this time. Interpretation of a dream about murder in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a girl in a dream shooting a man, this indicates this man’s love for her if she knows him However, if this girl introduces a man to her husband and sees in a dream that she is killing him, but with a tool other than bullets, then this indicates that this marriage has not been completed. But if she sees a murder in her dream, this indicates the psychological pressure that she is exposed to because of her exposure to some... Problems. If she sees that she was killed in a dream in self-defense, this indicates that she is close to marriage and assuming responsibility. Interpretation of a dream about killing a married woman by Al-Osaimi. Seeing a dream about killing in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the marital problems she faces. Murder can also indicate instability in marital life. If a married woman sees that she is a witness to a murder, this indicates her misfortune. Interpretation of a dream about killing a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman dreams of seeing a murder in a dream, this is evidence that she is facing many of the problems she faces during childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about killing a man. A man who dreams of being killed in In a dream, this is an indication of good nutrition and abundance. If a man sees that he is killing someone, this indicates extreme jealousy towards him. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Learn about the interpretation of poison in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Poison in a dream, among the dreams that some people see as a result of the fatigue and problems they suffer from in their lives, and those visions from Satan, where this action is depicted to the sleeper to suggest that this action is the only solution to get rid of obstacles, and in this article we explain that in detail...poison in dreams Commentators say that poison in a dream is one of the dreams that some people see as bad and that they are controlled by excessive fear and terror, but the interpretation of poison in a dream is one of the signs that translate into abundant money and multiple profits that the dreamer will acquire in reality, and if he sees himself drinking poison in a dream, this indicates that he Very good. As for the consumption of poison, swelling of the body and the appearance of diseases, it is a sign of the multiple money that the dreamer will receive. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he swallows poison, but nothing befalls him and he does not show symptoms of danger, then this is an indication of the strength and health that the dreamer enjoys. Poison In a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin sees in the interpretation of poison in a dream that it is one of the abundant profits and money that the dreamer will gain in the coming days. As for seeing drinking poison in a dream, which results in fatigue, bloating, and harm, it is interpreted as a means of livelihood depending on the extent of the illness that afflicts the dreamer. In the case of eating poison and vomiting it, this is a sign that he is falling into a cycle of worries and hardships that he will suffer from. The meaning of the dreamer seeing himself drinking poison in a dream, if he is free in reality, here indicates arrest and imprisonment as a result of an act. But when he eats poison in a dream and the dreamer is killed, this A sign of the nearness of death, and God knows best. Poison in a dream for Nabulsi. The great scholar Al-Nabulsi, in interpreting poison in a dream, believes that it indicates the dreamer’s abundant wealth. If the dreamer drinks poison in a hasty dream and its symptoms appear, this indicates the good and material gains that will come to him. And when you see poison in a dream, The dream and the dreamer is killed after eating it, this is a sign that the term is approaching and must be close to God. Poison in Al-Osaimi’s dreamAl-Osaimi believes that the appearance of poison in a dream is nothing but goodness and great care for its owner, the extent of his injury. In general, the appearance of poison, in Al-Osaimi’s opinion, indicates recovery. From any disease. Poison in an unmarried woman’s dream. Interpreters believe that poison in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of bad news that will befall the dreamer. If the dreamer sees someone drinking poison, this indicates an eye injury and there is a relative who hates her and wishes her harm. When she sees In a girl’s dream that she is eating food that contains poison, this is a sign that she is forced to do something against her will, or it may be a close marriage to a person with good morals and religion. But if the girl sees that she has poisoned someone, this indicates that she hates him and is planning something to get rid of him. In the event that An unmarried girl was studying and dreamed of drinking poison, as this indicates academic excellence and progress in higher grades. Poison in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream infected with poison while she was giving water to her husband means that she will bear financial responsibility for her family and support her husband in the coming days.

Interpreters believe that poison in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of bad news that will befall the dreamer. If the dreamer sees someone drinking poison, this indicates an eye injury and there is a relative who hates her and wishes her harm. When she sees In a girl’s dream that she is eating food that contains poison, this is a sign that she is forced to do something against her will, or it may be a close marriage to a person with good morals and religion. But if the girl sees that she has poisoned someone, this indicates that she hates him and is planning something to get rid of him. In the event that An unmarried girl was studying and dreamed of drinking poison, as this indicates academic excellence and progress in higher grades. Poison in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream infected with poison while she was giving water to her husband means that she will bear financial responsibility for her family and support her husband in the coming days.

title: Learn about the interpretation of disagreement in a dream from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream of disagreement in words

preview.html: A fighter in a dream is one of the strange visions that most of us see during sleep. This vision carries many connotations and meanings, the most important of which is that the dreamer wants to discharge the negative charges inside him. Today we will point out the most important interpretations of seeing a fight in a dream based on what was narrated by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and some other interpreters. Murderer in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a quarrel is a sign that the dreamer is always quarreling with others because of different opinions. Disagreements and quarrels in a dream indicate the negative energy that dominates the dreamer’s life. Seeing constant fighting in a dream is evidence of a permanent conflict between the dreamer and people in his social environment. Fahd Al-Osaimi also pointed out that seeing a fight in a dream is a sign that you will hear unpleasant news in the near future and it will negatively affect the dreamer’s life. Fighting in general in a dream shows that tension, pressure, and constant confusion control the dreamer’s life and he cannot make any right decision. Good visions that symbolize the strength of the relationship that brings them together. Fighting between battles in a dream is an indication of the approach of peace and the return of the relationship stronger than it was. A quarrel in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A quarrel in a dream, as Ibn Sirin mentioned, is a sign of the presence of a negative burden within the dreamer towards someone. And he cannot live normally until he relieves this burden. A disagreement in an employee’s dream is a sign that he will be subjected to violence by his boss at work and he is afraid to return this insult so that he will not be fired from work, if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is arguing. With one of his sisters or with his father, indicating his dissatisfaction with his home due to disagreement and differences of opinions. Ibn Sirin believes that the dreamer who sees a dispute with his household on charges of neglect and lack of care is evidence that he is very short with his family and always tends to isolate himself. A quarrel with one’s mother in a dream is one of the bad visions that indicate hearing unpleasant news. Fighting in a dream for unmarried women Fighting in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that she will triumph over all her enemies who are waiting for her downfall at any moment. Fighting in a woman’s dream using bladed weapons is an indication that many problems and fears dominate her life, so she never feels stable in her life. Fighting and quarreling in a woman’s dream is an indication that she is a random person in her life and cannot make any right decision in her life and is facing... Always problems because of the decisions you make. It is about being alert so as not to get into trouble. Interpretation of a dream about quarreling with a stranger about one person. If an unmarried woman sees during her sleep that she is fighting with a stranger and is subjected to a violent physical assault, this indicates a new emotional relationship that she will enter into in the near future. Quarrels Fighting with strangers about single people is positive visions that reflect the emergence of many positive things in the dreamer’s life, and if he is looking for a new job, he will find it in the coming period. A quarrel with words in an unmarried woman’s dream. Verbal disagreement in a dream indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about ants in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing ants in a dream is one of the interpretations that can cause anxiety and fear to the dreamer. Because ants are insects that really hurt people, and you may also recognize a lion in a dream, and in the following lines we will tell you about them. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream. We will also talk to you about the interpretation of a Chinese vision of ants. In a dream and seeing a crowd of ants. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream Read also: Washing the dead Seeing ants in a dream has many different signs and connotations depending on the position and shape of the ant in the dream: It could be ants in a dream A sign of weakness and weakness of some close people. Big ants may indicate enemies who are trying to harm you, but are unable to do so because of their weakness. When a person sees ants in a dream while they are flying, it can be a sign of a travel route inside or outside the country. It can be Ants are a sign of many fears and problems facing the dreamer. If the sleeper sees a group of ants, this may be a sign that some army or officials are protecting the person from a problem. Read also: Penguin in a dreamInterpretation of seeing ants in the house Ants in the house can sometimes indicate To something praiseworthy and other times it indicates something reprehensible, depending on the vision: When a person sees a lot of ants in the house, it can be a sign that there are a large number of children or the presence of a large number of people in that house. If the sleeper sees a group of If ants come out of the house, this may be a sign of poverty and lack of money. Interpretation of seeing ants in a dream: It may also be a sign that this person will rob his house. But when the sleeper sees that ants often enter his house, this can be evidence of abundance of kindness and food. And the money is in this house. If the fortuneteller is sick and then sees a crowd of ants in his house, this is a sign of the death of the sick person, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing ants coming out of the body. One of the unpleasant dreams is seeing ants coming out of the body, with several indicators: If one sees in a dream that there are a large number of ants covering his entire body, it may be a sign of death and the dreamer must repent to God. Seeing ants coming out of the mouth or tongue is a sign of gossip and many people talk about lies and lies. If During sleep, one sees that his hand or foot is covered with ants, this may be a sign of laziness, lack of dexterity, or failure to follow one’s duties. When the sleeper sees that ants are above his head, this may indicate the many worries that the dreamer cannot bear. Interpretation of seeing killing ants in Dream: Killing ants in a dream shows certain signs, such as: When a pregnant woman dreams that she is killing ants, this may be a sign of miscarriage due to lack of interest in her health. If a person sees that he is killing a group of ants, this is a sign of the death of a group of children, due to a painful accident or Revolutions or

title: Swimming in the sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Swimming in the sea in a dream. If the dreamer saw in a dream that he was swimming in the sea, then this indicates the goodness and good news that the Lord - the Almighty - brings to the dreamer and that he will obtain many good things in life. Below is an article there are all the interpretations that they gave themselves for swimming. In a dream...so follow us. Swimming in the sea in a dream. Seeing someone swimming in a dream is a good dream that leads to great goodness that will come to the dreamer in reality, God willing. If the dreamer sees himself swimming in the sea and reaches the shore while he is in reality a science student, this indicates that he is He will reach his goal in the sciences he studies and reach a reliable scientific position. When one sees that he is swimming in the sea but does not reach the shore and is already a scientist, this is an indication that he will not be able to reach the knowledge he wants and this will affect him negatively. And they tire him out a lot. Some interpreters tell us that seeing swimming in the sea means that the dreamer is trying to reach many things that he does not need to know. If the dreamer sees himself swimming in the sea but its water is dirty, it is interpreted that the dreamer is suffering from many things that are not good in reality and this makes him He feels uncomfortable and tired. Seeing garbage while the dreamer is swimming in a dream symbolizes his anxiety and doubts about one of his friends. Go to the Secrets of Interpretation of Dreams website from Google and you will find all the interpretations you are looking for. Swimming in the sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the sea in a dream A matter that has a set of interpretations that differ depending on the signs in the dream. If one sees in a dream that he is swimming in the sea and the weather is raining, this means that the dreamer will be exposed to illness in the coming period, but the Lord will grant him a recovery soon. I will. If the dreamer sees himself swimming very fast, it means that the dreamer is a hardworking person and will soon reach his goal. When one sees that he is swimming in the middle of the sea and finds a wonderful pearl, it is interpreted that God has written a great diet for him with his permission and he will get a lot of money In the coming season. Swimming in the sea with the intention of washing it in a dream indicates that the dreamer is distancing himself from his sins in this world and trying to atone for the mistakes he committed before and trying to follow the right path. If the dreamer sees himself swimming in the sea with another person he knows in the dream, this means that This person is trying to get him into trouble and will cause him many crises. Swimming in the sea in a singles dream. Seeing an unmarried woman swimming in a calm sea and being happy with her presence in a dream means that the dreamer lives a comfortable emotional life and feels calm and tender. If the dreamer sees during the dream that she was She swims with great difficulty in the sea, this means that she feels very sad because she is facing many crises with her lover and she feels comfortable. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is swimming in the sea with her fiancé in a dream, this indicates her closeness to him, God willing. When a girl sees that she is in If you dream of the sea and you cannot swim in it, this indicates that your eyesight is suffering

title: More than 20 interpretations of seeing graves in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing graves in a dream: A grave is that area of ​​land where a person is buried at the end of his life and perhaps seeing graves in a dream is one of the frightening visions that people feel because the common interpretation of this vision is always negative or has a frightening meaning of long term or deteriorating health, what What exactly does this dream symbolize? The interpretation of seeing graves in dreams is that some commentators say that the grave is a prison and the restrictions that surround it, which prevent him from reaching his dreams or achieving his goals, so he remains trapped between four walls and cannot get out of it, and the prison here could be a prison for him . king. And hallucinations. Seeing graves indicates a lot of anxiety, sadness, and despair of God’s mercy and grief, the cause of which the dreamer does not know. Entering graves is a sign of a succession of calamities, bad news, and extreme fatigue, alerting the dreamer to the necessity of moderation and stopping the sins he is doing, and the importance of returning to God and repenting. And if he sees If the dreamer goes to a place where people are buried and digs a hole in it, this is evidence that the dreamer will build a house for himself in this place, and it may indicate that he will move a lot until he settles down. And if he sees that people are burying him while he is alive, this is a sign of distress, frustration, and inability to move or Getting rid of the pressures and responsibilities imposed on him. If he sees green plants growing in the graves, this is a sign of God’s mercy for the people of the graves and those who live happily next to the Creator. If he sees that the grave of the deceased has become his place of residence, this indicates that the fortuneteller has lineage among the relatives of the owner of the grave. If he is found lying in an open or unfilled grave, it indicates travel and being far from his home for the sake of earning and legitimate profit. And if he walks to the graves and then it rains, this is a sign that God’s mercy includes everything and that He is Forgiving and Merciful to His servants, living and dead. It is said that whoever is buried The grave enjoys good health and longevity. If he sees that someone is digging a grave and then pushes the fortuneteller into it, this is evidence that someone is trying to distort his reputation and say insulting words to him or accuse him of things he did not do. And if he sees that someone is holding him and directing him to the graves, this indicates This person is hiding evil from him and wants to perish. And if he stands on a grave or finds himself praying over it, this indicates his many sins, that he is doing what God has forbidden, transgressing sacred things, and moving in the wrong direction. According to Miller’s Encyclopedia, we find that graves symbolize the following: Loss of money and job, catastrophic failure in studies, and a lot of anxiety and pessimism. It also symbolizes illness, poor psychological and nervous state, and loss of control. It is said that anyone who reads what is written on the grave has been assigned actions that he cannot perform or accept. Bad luck and a feeling That there is a constant threat to his life. Walking on graves is evidence of death before old age or a marriage that steals itself. If the grave is not old, this indicates that there are people following you and trying to ruin your life, or that you are committing the same mistakes that others have committed, or that you are in danger. And the grave Empty symbolizes betrayal and loss
